heading: Professional air conditioning for hot and freezing days.
subheading: Revolutionary diffuse cooling and long-term heating down to -35 °C. A clean, modern design and robust performance. The Sensitive Pro air conditioner is the only thing you need all year round.
why_info_item_1_description: Sensitive Pro won't let you down even on the coldest days. This powerful system ensures comfort and warmth in every season. Efficient heating with minimal energy costs.
why_info_item_2_description: The draft-free, diffuse cooling of the Stellair air conditioner ensures an even and gentle distribution of cooled air throughout the room without unpleasant drafts. This system enhances comfort without the risk of catching a cold.
why_info_item_3_description: As quiet as a summer breeze. At just 19 decibels in the quietest mode, the Sensitive Pro is almost inaudible. Ideal for bedrooms, offices, and any space where peace and comfort are essential.
why_info_item_4_description: UV-C light completely eliminates all bacteria and viruses, while the ionizer removes dust, allergens, and other impurities. These innovations in Naitec Sensitive Pro air conditioners create a healthier and safer environment in your home.
why_info_item_5_description: Wi-Fi control allows you to easily adjust temperature, modes, and other functions via your smartphone or tablet anytime, anywhere.
why_info_item_6_description: The high energy efficiency of R32 refrigerant ensures more effective cooling and heating while significantly reducing environmental impact. It is the ideal choice for a more sustainable future.
all_you_need_item_1_description: Naitec Sensitive Pro automatically cleans, sterilizes, and then disinfects its internal evaporator with UV light, ensuring that your air is always fresh and free from bacteria and viruses.
all_you_need_item_1_long_description: When the 'sterilization' function is activated, the evaporator in the indoor unit first freezes and then heats up to 57 °C, which, combined with the UV-C lamp and ionizer, ensures internal unit purification and the elimination of harmful bacteria. This technology provides a pleasant feeling of freshness and a healthy atmosphere without unnecessary negative effects.
all_you_need_item_2_title: Heating with air conditioning down to -35°C
all_you_need_item_2_description: The ability to efficiently heat down to -35 °C ensures a comfortable and pleasant environment even during colder winter days.
all_you_need_item_3_description: We prioritize quality, which is why the Naitec Sensitive Pro comes with a 5-year warranty, ensuring long-term reliability.
all_you_need_item_3_long_description: The extended warranty is valid only with regular servicing at least once a year by the supplier from whom you purchased the air conditioner.
all_you_need_item_4_description: Optional voice assistant Lisa for easy and convenient voice control of the air conditioner.
all_you_need_item_5_description: In the app, you can set a performance limit for the air conditioner, allowing you to save up to 70% energy.
effective_heating_description_1: Naitec air conditioners can heat very efficiently.
effective_heating_description_2: It is so powerful that it can heat effortlessly down to -35°C. Efficient heating with minimal energy costs, without the need for additional heat sources.
